m_szDocTitle: POSCO and China's Jilin Province to Carry Out Projects in Steel, Construction, and Other Fields
m_szDocSumamry: POSCO and China's Jilin Province to Carry Out Projects in Steel, Construction, and Other Fields Published on July 31, 2010 at 7:38 AM On July 19th, POSCO, for the first time as a single company, signed an agreement to build comprehensive business partnership with China`s Jilin Province and actively participate in the urban and industrial development. Chairman Joonyang Chung and Governor Rulin Wang of the Jilin Province agreed to carry out joint projects in five fields—steel, automobile, construction, public works, and the cutting edge industry—and signed the cooperation agreement.
